title: TheGoodDeal.in Associates with Amit Tandon: The Charity Nexus
text:
Monday, October 19, 2015 3:10PM IST (9:40AM GMT) TheGoodDeal.in Associates with Amit Tandon: The Charity Nexus New Delhi, Delhi, India 
TheGoodDeal.in , an acclaimed classified site owned by the Padawan Group associated with Mr. Amit Tandon, one of the best known observational standup comedians in India. The aim of the company was to create a buzz in the market about its presence in the CSR landscape of the country. The innovative campaign will live for this festive session October month and the winner will share the stage with Mr. Amit Tandon. Belongings of Mr. Amit Tandon will exchange for money and the collections will donate to charity. The online classified platform is aiming an innovative social media campaign for businesses in India. While smaller cities are gradually growing as business basses the need of an online platform for local classifieds has become pertinent. TheGoodDeal.in, offers a comprehensive platform to buy, sell, rent and exchange merchandises and services to businesses and individual owners. The recent campaign is active in posting pictures in the Facebook page of TheGoodDeal.in and Amit Tandon. The company also looks forward to connect with the entire target audience through mailers. Speaking on the event, Mr. Rupesh Kumar, Country Manager, TheGoodDeal.in says, "We brought forward an innovative and unique opportunity for classified sector in the Indian market to make their presence online and increase their growth. We are very glad to partner with Amit Tandon, the well know stand-up comedian to make our brand visible. We wish more customers to use our website, so that they can benefit from this facility and enhance their reach. This initiative will offer us a new platform to let the masses know about TheGoodDeal.in ”. TheGoodDeal.in is a website that highlights best opportunities to sell, buy and swap products more efficiently and easily with a fully customizable online storefront. With its tagline “Buy, Sell, Rent in India” it includes wide variety of merchandises such as vehicles, Real Estate, Services, Courses, Fashion, Electronics, Job and Leisure products. One can easily manage their advertisements with an increased chance of a consumer response. TheGoodDeal.in based in Dehradun in Uttarakhand in India, is a new generation free classified advertisement online medium launched in India in July 2014 with more than 4 million advertisements. TheGoodDeal.in has its operational reach across 22 countries and it is growing rapidly in various markets. About TheGoodDeal.in TheGoodDeal.in is one of 22 websites of the Padawan Group. It is an online-classified site with intuitive customer-centric features. The website is dedicated to online classifieds in India. The site provides local platforms to buy, sell, rent and exchange goods. Goods as well as services such as Vehicles, Electronics, Real Estate, Leisure, Course, Home, Fashion, Job, Service, Professional Equipment, Special Care, Free Personals and much more can be traded through the website. The site allows user to sell sizeable items such as immovable property and car. It provides ample features to promote businesses, offers job vacancies and sells new as well as used items easily under intensively arranged categories. Wide variety merchandises are arranged in the website under a number of categories and subcategories.
